author: deliriumdrop
content: Hi all, I saw a tweet that was asking for contributions to this very channel. Are there any priority items that a beginner dev can take up? I know JS, Rust, and Solidity pretty okay. Or if I can get pointed to some guidance documentation or anything that would be helpful too. I'm a senior dev in my day job, and I'm looking to get into more open source work.

author: jgm
content: There are a number of open issues at https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues you can take a look at

author: trent_vanepps
content: welcome! glad to see some new faces here
